channel.title: 562 Item Help!
channel.description: Okay I'm running a 562 and my dragon dagger (p++) wont wield iv tried anything and everything to fix this, so I'm resorting to you.. please help.

That is because their IDs were clearly not in said array, good job though.

item.description:
@BearrY wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:4, topic:539450”]You shouldn’t have deleted it but added onto it in the first place. I don’t see why it wouldn’t work now if you added it properly to the definitions constant. Perhaps post where you found the dds id, in a big block like this:

Also all of the poised weapons don’t wield, like I can wield regular dragon dagger, just not the p++.

I FIXIED IT! BTW… BUT THANKS!

item.title: 562 Item Help!
item.dc:creator: @BearrY BearrY
item.description:
@BearrY wrote:

Pure_:

Item slots are probably held in a constant array somewhere like torsos, legs etc. look for an array named something like weapon 2hwep 2d sword etc. then add its id there. A good starting place would be to search for the id of a weapon which wields properly. You could also trace the code from the equip item packet and see the equipping logic and thus identify how weapon definitions are loaded.

I’v found the array that does put it in the weapon slot it looks fine… then also I’v found the equip item which its 1164 for the dds, and changed it in everything I could find that had to deal with the equipment id number. Also I looked in my items data if maybe the name was different by maybe a space or two but, it wasn’t either… and there was also a whole copy of my data inside of my data… it was weird, and Idk if he was using it for a backup or what but I didn’t know if it would effect this so i deleted it… and it still doesn’t work… and now I’m here.

Read full topic
